document.full_text: top seed novak djokovic reached the serbia open final without hitting a ball on saturday after fellow serb janko tipsarevic pulled out of their semi-final with a thigh injury.
document.title: djokovic and lopez reach serbia open final
lines_and_colors: top seed novak djokovic reached the serbia open final without hitting a ball on saturday after fellow serb janko tipsarevic pulled out of their semi-final with a thigh injury.
